nodes.text: The Martyrium of Frozen Tears was a location in the Meridional Ice Cap on the planet Tython, said to hold a confessional made of solid kyberite. The scholar Korin Aphra attempted to track down its location, learning that it was in the Deep Core, but was unable to find it. Later, Korin's daughter Chelli Lona Aphra led Darth Vader to the Martyrium as a diversion to mislead him from the Rebel Alliance's main base on the Outer Rim planet Hoth.
